item.description:
Dear Members,

I am happy to announce an outdoor meet!!!  The weather forecast for Sept. 18th is sunny with temperature around 65+, so I am inviting you to a private outdoor meet begining at 2:15 pm on Sept. 18, Sunday and running until 4 pm.  This site is in Newton.  Only those that RSVP will be given the address.

PLEASE RSVP SEPARATELY FOR THIS SPECIAL OUTDOOR EVENT.  Only the 1st 25 people that send me an RSVP can attend due to a limit.

In case of rain, which is not expected, we will instead meet at the Meadows as usual from 2:15-4:15.  On Friday and Saturday, Sept. 16th and 17th, I will email everyone that RSVP's a confirmation based on an updated weather report.

 

Small dog best,

Kim

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Mass. Small Breed Dog Meetup, Sept. 18th, 2:15, Newton private outdoor setting
